g.text: 1.1 DFSP1 sends a Prepare Transfer request to DFSP2
DFSP1 sends a Prepare Transfer request to Payee
validates incoming token, and the originator matches Payer
Routes & Publishes Prepare event for Payer
Ensures that event is replicated as configured (ACKS=all)
Responds replication acknoledgements have been received
Consumes Prepare event message for Payer
Request to retrieve Payer Participant details (if it exists)
return Participant details if it exists
return Participant details if it exists
Request to retrieve Payee Participant details (if it exists)
return Participant details if it exists
return Participant details if it exists
Request to retrieve Transfer (if it exists)
Validates message signature (to be confirmed in future requirement)
Persist Transfer State with transferState='RECEIVED' on validation pass
Routes & Publishes Position event for Payer
Consumes Prepare event batch of messages for Payer
Request to persist event information for batch of messages
Request to retrieve batch of Payer Participant details (if it exists)
return Participant details if it exists
return Participant details if it exists
Request to retrieve batch of Payee Participant details (if it exists)
return Participant details if it exists
return Participant details if it exists
Request to retrieve batch of Transfers (if it exists)
return batch of Transfers (if it exists)
return batch of Transfer (if it exists)
Validates duplicate Check against in-memory var $LIST_TRANSFERS
Validates message signature (to be confirmed in future requirement)
Persist Transfer State with transferState='RECEIVED' on validation pass
Routes & Publishes Position event for Payer
Consumes Position event message for Payer
Request latest position from DB for Payer
Retrieves latest position from DB for Payer
Validate Calculated latest position against the net-debit cap (netcap) - Rule: lpos < netcap
Request to persist latest position for Payer
Persists latest position to DB for Payer
Persist Transfer State with transferState='RESERVED' on position check pass
Consumes Position event batch of messages for Payer
Request to persist event information for batch of messages
Request latest position from DB for Payer
Retrieves latest position from DB for Payer
Calculates latest position (lpos) by incrementing transfer for prepare
Validate Calculated latest position against the net-debit cap (netcap) - Rule: lpos < netcap
Request to persist latest position for Payer
Persists latest position to DB for Payer
Persist Transfer State with transferState='RESERVED' on position check pass
Consumes Transfer event batch of messages for Payer
Request to persist event information for batch of messages
Requests to persist event information - POST - HTTP://events/
Requests Notification details for Payer - GET - HTTP://notifications/DFPS1
HTTP Callback with Prepare result to Payer
Consumes Notifications event batch of messages for Payer
Requests to persist batch event information - POST - HTTP://events/
Request to persist batch event information
Requests Notification details for Payer - GET - HTTP://notifications/DFPS1
HTTP Callback with Prepare result to Payer
Requests to persist event information - POST - HTTP://events/
Requests Notification details for Payee - GET - HTTP://notifications/DFPS1
HTTP Callback with Prepare result to Payee
Consumes Notifications event batch of messages for Payee
Requests to persist batch event information - POST - HTTP://events/
Request to persist batch event information
Requests Notification details for Payee - GET - HTTP://notifications/DFPS1
HTTP Callback with Prepare result to Payee
